name: GMTK - LANCE
description:
Controls:

  • WASD or left analog stick for movement
  • Mouse or right analog stick to point your lance
  • SPACE or left bumper to jump
  • Q and R or left trigger and right trigger to zoom in and out
  • Z and C or BACK and START to switch between levels
  • R key or B button to restart a level
  • ESC to quit

NOTES:

  • Controllers probably won't work on Windows, so you'll have to use the keyboard and mouse. I'll try to put up a build that fixes this soon.
  • Controllers must be plugged in before starting the game, otherwise they won't work.
  • You'll need Java 6 in order to run the .jar file.
  • Run the .jar file by double-clicking on it, just like any other program.
  • Yes, it's unfinished.
